var b strings.Builder
b.Grow(32)
for i, p := range []int{2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13} {
    fmt.Fprintf(&b, "%d:%d, ", i+1, p)
}
s := b.String()   // no copying
s = s[:b.Len()-2] // no copying (removes trailing ", ")
fmt.Println(s)

    fmt.Printf("%d:%q ", i, ch)

// byte
